get.summary: Get all Trainings scheduled for a Trainer

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by Trainee First or Last Name

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Filter trainings starting from this date

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Filter trainings ending by this date
